mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
mapper.select: SELECT /*selectErrorLogInfoOne*/ REQUST_INSTT_ID , RASMBLY_NM , TAR_LOG.SERVER_IP , PROVD_INSTT_ID /* 요청코드 */ , REQUST_RECPTN_TM /* 요청일자 */ , RESULT_CODE /* 결과코드*/ , RESULT_MSSAGE /* 결과메세지 */ FROM TAR_LOG, COLGOVER WHERE TAR_LOG.REQUST_INSTT_ID = COLGOVER.RASMBLY_ID AND REQUST_ID = #{requstId} /* 오류메시지 아이디 */ AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(TAR_LOG CLIK_TAR_LOG_CHART_IDX2) */ REQUST_ID , REQUST_INSTT_ID , RASMBLY_NM , TAR_LOG.SERVER_IP , PROVD_INSTT_ID /* 요청코드 */ , REQUST_RECPTN_TM /* 요청일자 */ , RESULT_CODE /* 결과코드*/ , CODE_NM /* 결과코드명 */ , RESULT_MSSAGE /* 결과메세지 */ FROM TAR_LOG, COLGOVER, COMMON_DETAIL_CODE WHERE TAR_LOG.REQUST_INSTT_ID = COLGOVER.RASMBLY_ID AND RESULT_CODE = CODE AND CODE_ID = 'RIS007' AND RESULT_CODE != '000' AND RESULT_CODE != '104' -- AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD'),+11)),'YYYYMMDD') -- todo: 운영서버 반영시 아래 주석 풀어야 함. AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE+1)-TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D'),'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE+1)-TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D'),'YYYYMMDD') AND CNTC_ID IS NOT NULL
-- SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMMON_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'RIS007' -- 코드 테이블

SELECT SUM(CNT) FROM ( SELECT REQUST_INSTT_ID, COUNT(*) CNT FROM TAR_LOG WHERE RESULT_CODE != '000' AND RESULT_CODE != '104' AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE+1)-TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D'),'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE+1)-TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D'),'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY REQUST_INSTT_ID )
